text: The Return of Sherlock Holmes is a collection of 13 Sherlock Holmes stories by Arthur Conan Doyle, originally published in 1903-1904. The Return of Sherlock Holmes may also refer to: ==Film== *The Return of Sherlock Holmes (1929 film) *The Return of Sherlock Holmes (1987 film) *1994 Baker Street: Sherlock Holmes Returns ==Stage== *The Return of Sherlock Holmes (play) ==Television== *Sherlock Holmes (1984 TV series) or The Return of Sherlock Holmes ==See also== * Sherlock Holmes Returns, 1993 telefilm
title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes (disambiguation)
